attributes.action: Petition the General Synod for the removal of Dr Williams as Archbishop of Canterbury
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Archbishop has failed in his duty to the Anglican Church by suggesting that Sharia should be in any way integrated into the laws of England and Wales. We find this offensive and Williams should be removed forthwith either by petitioning the General Synod or the Queen as head of the Church.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
